full_text: - Beas 2014/KER/S3 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE A-HARIPRASAD WEDNESDAY, THE 1ST DAY OF JANUARY 2014/11TH POUSHA, 1935 CrLMCNo. 1723 of 2010 () CRIME NO.217/2010 OF THE PALLICKATHODU POLICE STATION PETITIONER(S)/ACCUSED: JOGIMON MATHEW, AGED 32 YEARS, S/O.MATHAI, VADAKKEDATHU HOUSE, PULICKAL KAVALA VAZHOOR, KOTTAYAM. BY ADV. SRI.M.J.THOMAS RESPONDENT(S)/STATE & COMPLAINANT: 1. STATE OF KREALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2. THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, PALLICKATHODU POLICE STATION, KOTTAYAM. 3. PK.PURUSHOTHAMAN, S/O. KUMARAN, PANDIMAKAL HOUSE, VAZHOOR P.O., KOTTAYAM. R3 BY ADV. SRLPKURUVILLA JACOB RI & R2 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. BINDU GOPINATH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 01-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Beas 2014/KER/53 CRL.MC, NO.1723/2010 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A TRUE COPY OF THE CMP NO.1701/2010 FILED BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT NO.1, KANJIRAPPALLY ANNEXURE B CERTIFIED COPY OF THE CRIME NO.217/2010 OF PALLICKATHODU POLICE STATION ANNEXURE C TRUE COPY OF THE SALE DEED NO.1103/2002 OF SRO VAZHOOR RESPONDENTS' EXHIBITS: NIL TRUE COPY// oe Beet 2014/KER/53 A.HARIPRASAD, J. Cri.M.C. No.1723 of 2010 Dated this the 1* day of January, 2014. ORDER Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner. Perused the affidavit dated 17.10.2013 filed by the 3 respondent. 2. Learned counsel for the petitioner submitted that the offence alleged against the petitioner is punishable under Section 406 of the Indian Penal Code. Since the matter has been settled, | find that the petition can be allowed. Annexure-B FIR is hereby quashed. All pending interlocutory applications will stand dismissed. A. HARIPRASAD, JUDGE. cks
